Title: The Shiny Shrimps
Writer: Romain Choay (collaboration), Maxime Govare (screenplay), Cédric Le Gallo (original idea), Cédric Le Gallo (screenplay)
Actors: Nicolas Gob, Alban Lenoir, Michaël Abiteboul, David Baïot
Plot: Matthias Le Goff, an Olympic champion at the end of his career, makes a homophobic statement on TV. His punishment: coach the Shiny Shrimps, a flamboyant and amateur gay water-polo team. ...
